name: Culinary Delights
description: Exploring the charm of culinary arts and cooking techniques, from home-cooked dishes to world-renowned cuisine, experiencing the diverse flavors of multiculturalism.

groups.name: Traditional Chinese Cuisine
groups.description: The essence of regional Chinese dishes such as Sichuan, Cantonese, and Huaiyang cuisine.

groups.name: Western Baking
groups.description: The sweet art of baking bread, cakes, and pastries.

groups.name: Japanese Cuisine
groups.description: The simple yet refined flavors of sushi, sashimi, and delicate plating.

groups.name: Korean BBQ
groups.description: The combination of marination and charcoal grilling, paired with a variety of side dishes.

groups.name: Southeast Asian Cuisine
groups.description: The fusion of coconut milk and spices in Thai, Vietnamese, and other regional flavors.

groups.name: Mediterranean Flavors
groups.description: Healthy cooking with olive oil, herbs, and seafood.

groups.name: French Fine Dining
groups.description: Emphasizing high-quality ingredients and exquisite plating for romantic cuisine.

groups.name: Italian Pasta and Pizza
groups.description: The classic combination of tomato sauce, cheese, and pasta or pizza.

groups.name: Seafood Feast
groups.description: Fresh seafood and sweet flavors in a seafood banquet.

groups.name: BBQ and Grilling
groups.description: Outdoor grilling and smoky flavors for lively gatherings.

groups.name: Desserts and Cakes
groups.description: Exquisite craftsmanship and multiple textures for sweet indulgence.

groups.name: Chocolate Art
groups.description: Multiple cocoa flavors and handmade craftsmanship in a sweet world.

groups.name: Tea and Coffee
groups.description: The rich flavors and cultural heritage of hot beverages.

groups.name: Spicy Cuisine
groups.description: Stimulating flavors such as hot pot and spicy stir-fries.

groups.name: Vegetarian Cuisine
groups.description: Healthy eating with vegetables, fruits, and legumes as the main ingredients.

groups.name: Hot Pot and Braised Dishes
groups.description: Multiple ingredients in a simmering pot, with spicy and savory flavors.

groups.name: Convenience Food and Fast Food
groups.description: Convenient and flavorful meals for a fast-paced lifestyle, with variety and taste.

groups.name: Snacks and Leisure Food
groups.description: Easy-to-eat snacks for any time and place, with a variety of flavors.

groups.name: Global Bread Collection
groups.description: A variety of bread styles from around the world, such as baguettes, dark rye, and soft Asian bread.

groups.name: Creative Cuisine
groups.description: Fusion of new ingredients and cooking techniques, pushing the boundaries of culinary innovation.

groups.name: Private Kitchen Delights
groups.description: Home-cooked flavors and personal touches in culinary creations.

groups.name: Cooking Class Scenes
groups.description: Demonstrative or classroom-style teaching operations and atmosphere.

groups.name: Food Table Setting
groups.description: Visual and flavorful emphasis on table setting and environmental design.

groups.name: Street Food
groups.description: The unique charm of street vendors and regional snacks.
